name: Admonishing Ray
text: You blast your enemies with rays of nonlethal force. You may fire one ray, plus one additional ray for every four levels you possess beyond 3rd (to a maximum of three rays at 11th level). Each ray requires a ranged touch attack to hit and deals 4d6 points of nonlethal damage. This is a force effect. The rays may be fired at the same or different targets, but all rays must be fired simultaneously and aimed at targets within 30 feet of each other. The rays hit about as hard as a punch from a strong adult human, and can knock away unattended objects weighing up to 10 pounds if that amount of force could normally do so.
text_zh: 你用非致命力场的射线轰炸敌人。你可以发射一条射线，并且在3级之后每提升4级可以多一条（最高11级达到3条）。每条射线在远程接触命中后都会造成4d6点非致命性伤害。这是一个力场效果。射线可以瞄准一个或多个不同目标发射，但是多个目标之间互相不能间隔超过30尺。被射线命中相当于被一个强壮的成年人一拳击中，并且可以如普通施力方式一般击飞至多10磅的物体。
